posts.title: Hairy Insights: A UX Perspective
posts.description: UX design is a craft of patience and intuitive decisions based on insights. What can our hair teach us about UX?
posts.author: Joe Toscano

posts.title: Oh Sherpa, my Sherpa
posts.description: A discussion on how augmented reality can be used to create a useful, usable and compelling on mountain experience.
posts.author: Joe Toscano

posts.title: How to Team
posts.description: When a great team comes together it’s one of the most beautiful things you’ll ever be a part of, and that’s why it’s so rare.
posts.author: Joe Toscano

posts.title: Let It Be
posts.description: When I find myself in times of trouble Mother Mary comes to me, Speaking words of wisdom, let it be, let it be
posts.author: Joe Toscano

posts.title: 3D Printing Will Cause an Industrial Revolution
posts.description: I know it sounds like a completely outrageous statement, I know, but you’ll believe it in a second.
posts.author: Joe Toscano

posts.title: The End of Writing is Near
posts.description: We’re becoming so advanced we’re regressing
posts.author: Joe Toscano

posts.title: Product Design is the new form of Leadership
posts.description: As a leader it is our job to enable. I believe the same mindset should apply when creating a product.
posts.author: Joe Toscano

posts.title: I need a Spiff
posts.description: Our hope in creating this application is that we will create a community without users knowing they’re creating it for us.
posts.author: Joe Toscano
